name: Drawn Together (Stickle)
description:
"Drawn Together" is a 15-25 minute short linear narrative game based on the idea of togetherness and falling behind.

Set in an animation studio, follow the main protagonist Ed who lied on his resume to get an internship, and experience the unfolding story of being placed on the toughest project of his life.

How to Play:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move 

Enter/Return Key to interact or go through dialogue

Note: This is the first actual game story primarily written by me (Stickle), so it may be a bit rough around the edges (especially since I wrote it all in one night). I do hope you enjoy it though!

Note x2: This game is linear! There is one and only one ending!

Credits: 

Art + Sections of dialogue: BSMProductions

Programming + Story: Stickle

The website Stick was able to make music on: Bandlab

Remembering how to export files: Brackeys

References: 

The entire Team Azule library, most particularly The Butler Did It! and a super secret title 0_0
